name: A Windigo Tale
description:
**********************************************

WILLING TO RISK YOUR LIFE TO SAVE YOUR FRIEND ?

Two friends go camping in the woods until during the night one of them seems to get kidnapped... by an unknown being, find out what it is and save your friend !

----------------------------------------------

Controls :

movement - WASD / Arrow keys

Interact - Z

If Z doesn't start the game, make sure to click on the game window or refresh the page !

----------------------------------------------

Credits to -

Pedro Gouveia

João Ponte

Daniel Gonçalves

----------------------------------------------

DISCLAIMER :

This is a prototype made for a school project, expect unfinished features.

**********************************************
